entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain beginning near midnight then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
